branchCategory.name: BP
branchCategory.description: The Series BP1000 regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. Available options include Hastelloyinternals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.The BP1000W is a welded connection series, back pressure regulator for ultra high purity (UHP) gas delivery in semiconductor and other clean industries.  Available options include Hastelloy internals for corrosion resistance, a tube stub weld fitting connection type, and various surface finishes.

branchItem.name: BP1000, Back Pressure Regulator for General Applications
branchItem.description: The Series BP1000 regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. Available options include Hastelloyinternals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.

branchItem.name: BP1000, Welded Connection Back Pressure Regulator for Ultra High Purity
branchItem.description: The BP1000W is a welded connection series, back pressure regulator for ultra high purity (UHP) gas delivery in semiconductor and other clean industries.  Available options include Hastelloy internals for corrosion resistance, a tube stub weld fitting connection type, and various surface finishes.
